home.title: IODA
home.subheader: A platform for Applied Network Data Analysis
home.otf: This platform is supported by the Open Technology Fund under contract number 1002-2018-027.
home.dhs: This platform is supported by Department of Homeland Security Science and Technology Directorate (DHS S&T) contract HHSP 233201600012C (Science of Internet Security: Technology and Experimental Research), and DHS S&T cooperative agreement FA8750-12-2-0326 (Supporting Research and Development of Security Technologies through Network and Security Data Collection).
home.comcast: Additional funding to work on visualization interfaces was generously provided by a Comcast research grant.
home.nsf: This platform was supported by NSF grant CNS-1228994 (Detection and Analysis of Large-scale Internet Infrastructure Outages (IODA)).
home.isoc: Additional funding to support this platform was generously provided by a grant from the Internet Society.
home.dos2: U.S. Department of State, Bureau of Democracy, Human Rights, and Labor
